titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on the Budget.

calendar.text: Committee on the Budget ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on the Budget. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Gregg. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: 1/31/2005--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on the Budget for the 109th Congress.
